item.title: Ren Bell
item.description: An inter-planal magical alarm for [[Ren’owa Arkhana, Master of Blades]]. When rung, Ren will appear. There is no guarantee he will stay if he is busy, or uninterested in your plight.

item.title: Ren'owa Arkhana, Master of Blades
item.description: Master Ren is a fearsome opponent. He is a dark freelancer, who has heavy ties with [[Arkhism]], and Tiefling Cultists.

item.title: The Warden's Vault of Souls
item.description: Added Damage = (LVL + DEX) / 2 If the user deals a killing blow to a being with this weapon, they can trap their soul in an astral box.

item.title: Tom's Foolery
item.description: Heyo! Welcome to the Tom’s Foolery Wiki! I’ll be publishing notes to this wiki usually after every session, depending on what you guys have found.
